          Blend all color components with another color's.

 Color ReadonlyColor.copy()
           
 Color LineStyle.getMainColor()

 Color Color.scaleAlpha(double factor)
          Multiply the alpha color component by the given factor, clamping the result to [0.0, 1.0].
 Color Color.scaleRGB(double factor)
          Multiply each of the red/green/blue color components by the given factor, clamping the results to [0.0, 1.0].
 Color Color.set(double red, double green, double blue, double alpha)
          Set all of this color's components, clamped to [0.0, 1.0].
 Color Color.set(ReadonlyColor other)
          Set all of this color components to match another color's.
 Color Color.setAlpha(double alpha)
          Set this color's alpha component, clamped to [0.0, 1.0].
 Color Color.setBlue(double blue)
          Set this color's blue component, clamped to [0.0, 1.0].
 Color Color.setGreen(double green)
          Set this color's green component, clamped to [0.0, 1.0].
 Color Color.setRandom()
          Set each of this color's components to a random value in [0.0, 1.0).
 Color Color.setRandomRGB()
          Set this color's red, green, and blue (excluding alpha) components to a random value in [0.0, 1.0).
 Color Color.setRed(double red)
          Set this color's red component, clamped to [0.0, 1.0].
 Color Color.setRGBA(int rgba)
          Set all color components from a packed 32-bit integer.
 

Methods in libshapedraw.primitive with parameters of type Color
 LineStyle LineStyle.set(Color color, float width, boolean hasSecondaryColor)
          Convenience method to set mainColor, mainWidth, secondaryColor, and secondaryWidth at once.
 LineStyle LineStyle.set(Color mainColor, float mainWidth, Color secondaryColor, float secondaryWidth)
          Set all components of this line style.
 LineStyle LineStyle.setMainColor(Color mainColor)
          Set the line style's main color, which cannot be null.
 LineStyle LineStyle.setSecondaryColor(Color secondaryColor)
          Set the line style's secondary color, which can be null.
